column1: Dein Profil als Senior Data Analyst…

Du verstehst das „große Ganze“ – konntest viele Einblicke in unterschiedliche Branchen und in Unternehmensabteilungen sammeln und letztendlich erfolgreich Strategien für den Kunden ausarbeiten und umsetzen.
Die Umgebung rund um das Thema Business Intelligence ist dir vertraut und deine Wohlfühlzone! Auch Projekte mit Schnittmengen zu anderen Bereichen können dich nicht abschrecken.
Du hast mehrjährige Erfahrung mit Reportingtools
Du hinterblickst selbstständig Datenströme in Unternehmen und kommst sowohl mit strukturierten als auch mit unstrukturierten Datenquellen als Datenbasis sehr gut zurecht!
Du bist sicher im Umgang mit Sicherheitskonzepten und kannst Berechtigungen sowie Authentifizierung unter Einbeziehung der vorherrschenden BI-Infrastruktur abbilden und umsetzen.

Du bist dazu in der Lage eigenständige Entscheidungen bei der Integration von Data Analytics Lösungen zu treffen – ganz egal ob bei der Implementierung von Self-Service-Lösungen oder der Bereitstellung von Reports in Kundenprojekten.

column1: Dann solltest du diese Gelegenheit nicht verpassen und weiterlesen!

Mein Kunde gehört mit über 2.000 Mitarbeitern und 7 Millionen Kunden zu den erfolgreichsten E-Commerce-Unternehmen in Deutschland mit Hauptsitz in Berlin. Seit mittlerweile fast 20 Jahren bereichern sie den Markt und unterstützen nebenbei auch viele gemeinnützige Organisationen weltweit. Das Wohlbefinden der Mitarbeiter steht dabei im Vordergrund und wird durch zahlreiche Goodies und großartige Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten gefördert und wertgeschätzt.
Als Marketing Data Analyst Unterstützt Du Das Team Im Rahmen Eines Datengetriebenen Marketings Optimierte Und Personalisierte Maßnahmen Zu Entwickeln
Analysen zum Kaufverhalten der Kunden und zu Kohorten Entwicklung

Interpretation der Ergebnisse und Ableiten von Handlungsempfehlungen für das Marketing
Verständnis von marketingstrategischen Fragestellungen und CRM
Proaktivität und Kreativität für Deine Projekte

column2: DE;2 months;2020-03-03 23:45;False;"Help us make work a better place! Small Improvements is turning traditional performance management into an ongoing and meaningful conversation. We serve 750 customers worldwide

column1: We’re looking for an experienced Product Manager who loves agile software development. Help us move faster and craft an awesome user experience for existing and new customers alike.
If you’re a pragmatic self-starter and love a challenge
column2: if you enjoy working with smart and opinionated people

column1: You Will Be In Charge Of The Following
We’re a company of 35 smart and opinionated people
column3: and want to grow. Help us build great functionality that inspires prospects and keeps customers happy.

column1: Contribute to the product vision and strategy together with the VP of Product
Gather input from across the company
column2: and interview customers and prospects and users in our target market

column1: Manage the backlog and discovery pipeline
Work closely with our data analyst to really understand feature usage and patterns
Collaborate with the Design Team during the wireframes/prototypes/mockup phases and test them with clients and target market test users
Work closely with developers to ensure they have the level of detail they need to solve the user problem in the right way
Communicate across the organization on progress
column3: and keep everyone in the loop

column1: Launch (and sunset) features together with marketing and support
Keep up with the HR Tech market and how we stack up against competitors

Our cross-functional dev-teams plus the design-team typically work on many features or improvements in parallel on both the discovery/experiment side as well as implementation. Every project can be different
column2: but most likely you’ll be heavily involved in many of these at any given time
column3: and you’ll have a chance to contribute to others too.

column1: We Believe That The Following Traits Will Be Beneficial
You love to approach things incrementally
column2: understanding that it is important to validate assumptions and invest accordingly

column1: You’re analytical and really thrive when designing complex features and workflows
You routinely consider the business impact of decisions — ROI and MRR are just as central to you as customer satisfaction.
You are very interested in the topic of how organizations can work better
column2: and how feedback and reflection can promote energizing work cultures

column1: You’re an optimist and make things happen!
We expect you to have a strong background in building complex software the agile way:
You have at least three years of “core” product management experience on advanced web-based applications
You’ve made major contributions to at least two different products
You’re used to working in small companies or startups where individual impact really matters
You have plenty of experience collaborating directly with developers and customers
You are a creative problem solver understanding there is never just one solution
Experience working in B2B settings would be a huge plus
We’re serious about our open and tolerant company culture
column2: and we value diversity. We’re looking for friendly and bright people who can develop a great product without developing a huge ego.

column1: More reasons to work at SI
We’re self-funded — our only “investors” are our amazingcustomerswho have helped us grow our customer base largely through word of mouth.
We balance life at work with life outside of work
column2: and we don’t believe in overtime. If you want to work from home one day a week or a few weeks a year

column5: die schließlich Teil einer journalistischen Geschichte sein können.

column1: We are looking for a Young Professional Client Data Analyst (m/f/d) who would like to develop their career within the field of data analysis and data engineering.
Responsibility for the analysis of data structures of numerous customer databases as well as the design of the database architecture.

column5: Physics or Engineering disciplines – or you have a comparable professional experience
column6: e.g. as an IT specialist with an excellent examination.

You are characterised by your ability to think analytically
column2: your mental flexibility and your ability to solve problems.

column1: You have an independent and methodical working style and a high degree of initiative.
You solve problems within the given time by means of your practice-oriented way of working and your technical enthusiasm.
You are team-oriented and are happy to pass on your knowledge and experience to the team with which you work to solve problems.
You know how to present yourself to customers in a competent and service-oriented manner.
Personal consultation – Intensive consultation prior to hiring in order to determine which IT profession best suits your personality
Individual induction program – Personally tailored to your individual needs and with a guarantee of success for certification in the chosen career path.
Training and support concept – An innovative and continuous training program with everything that e-learning
column2: classroom and onsite training from renowned providers and manufacturers have to offer.

column1: Mentoring and Coaching – Including regular feedback and target agreement discussions with management and the certainty that you are always a person with personality and not a personnel number in a group.

column1: Exciting career perspectives – From further development to management consultant or internalisation to further specialisation within the organisation of our clients.
Permanent employment for an indefinite period – with salaries in line with the market and all the aforementioned advantages!

Have we caught your interest? Then we look forward to receiving your application documents and ask you to send them to jobs@talentschmiede.com . Please do not forget to let us know your salary expectations and possible starting date.

column2: DE;7 hours;2020-04-28 16:45;False;"SGEF Digital Factory is about what fits. We want to make the best digital products to fit with our customers’ expectations and keep us at the forefront of innovation in our sector.

column1: And we want to find the best fit for our people to make sure that they are happy
column2: challenged and supported in their work.

column1: As one of our first hires
column2: you will have a fantastic opportunity to shape the data strategy and be a member of the core team.

column1: We’re ambitious and want to build an excellent team in our Berlin HQ as quickly as we can.
We’re looking for someone who loves to build a team from scratch and is at their best when working in a fast-paced environment where you can create your own processes.
You will have end-to-end responsibility from data exploration to applying machine learning techniques and building production-ready applications
Your work will directly enable innovative product features such as a automatic credit decision
Mentoring junior members in the team and helping them when they have questions
Staying up to date with the latest trends and sharing your discoveries with your fellow coworkers
You have a sound experience in the development and productionizing of machine learning solutions
You understand the common machine learning algorithms
You have good development skills in Python with TensorFlow or Pytorch
You speak either German or French
You already have some experience in FinTech

column1: BCG Digital Ventures is getting ready to launch a new product and venture which is set to disrupt the EUR 2+bn construction bidding industry. Built together with and backed by a leading mining company

we are kicking the construction industry into the next gear by addressing its currently outdated processes that lack transparency. How can we make pre-construction processes more transparent and efficient for both General Contractors and Sub-Contractors? How do we make sure that time and resources are not wasted while more projects are won in the process?

column1: Our ultimate goal is to create a 360° solution for the construction industry. To do so

column3: we will continue to build the SaaS and add machine learning to have intelligent and matching algorithms while enabling contractors to generate more projects. column2: set to radically improve the understanding and transparency of real estate markets based on data-driven insights. We aggregate and analyse a wide variety of data
column3: run big data analytics and use state-of-the-art machine learning to generate stable and reliable valuations and predictive analytics for the real estate market. We are headquartered in Zürich
column5: Berlin and Tokyo. We work on international markets. We are backed by world-class investors. We have a startup environment
column6: low bureaucracy and international team and business.

column1: Data is at the core of PriceHubble. We process a wide variety of data from multiple sources. As a data scientist
column2: your mission will be to develop cutting edge valuation and forecasting systems for the real estate market. You will manipulate a wide range and variety of data
column4: and identify patterns that eventually impact prices in the real estate market. You will then use specific machine learning approaches to design the best valuation and forecasting solutions. As a significant part of your daily work
column5: you will take part to the productionalization of the models developed by the data science team and contribute to our international expansion. You will work closely with the business team to integrate client feedback into our solutions.

everphone’s mission is to equip every employee worldwide with a modern
smartphone and the best productivity apps - therefore digitizing the entire
workforce! everphone is a device-as-a-service platform which equips
employees with rental smartphones and tablets while delivering a flexible
safe and cost-efficient service. By partnering with software providers
offer integrative mobile technological solutions which help our business
partners drive change and digitization within their organization. We are
part of the circular economy - everphone’s business model saves companies
more than 60 kg of carbon dioxide for each device rented
average device lifetime and returning more than 95% of raw materials into
the production process. We help organizations achieve their digitization
goals sustainably and demonstrate how technology solves business problems.
everphone was founded by serial entrepreneur Jan Dzulko who

Wir gehören zu den Top-Adressen in der IT-Welt und fokussieren uns auf die Optimierung der Kerngeschäftsprozesse unserer Kunden. Unseren Erfolg aber erreichen wir nur durch eins: die Menschen bei adesso! Lassen Sie sich von uns überzeugen. Vermitteln und gestalten - unser IT-Consulting ist das starke Bindeglied zwischen Fachabteilungen und IT. An der Schnittstelle von Theorie und Praxis braucht es kluge Köpfe mit Organisationstalent. column5: Statistik oder Mathematik und interessieren sich für eine Werkstudenten Stelle oder für eine spannende Abschlussarbeit zum Thema Big Data und Data Science? Dann sind Sie bei adesso genau richtig! Bei uns übernehmen Sie die fachliche Entwicklung und Umsetzung eines Big Data oder Data Science Use Cases. Bei der Umsetzung werden Sie systematisch von einem erfahrenen Kollegen begleitet und unterstützt.
